backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles and book project types with access-controlled queries and updates for profiles and structured writing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new multi-character questionnaire features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing purposes of various frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and styles.
frontend/DRAFT_BUILD.md: Instructions for building, deploying, and testing the draft featuring the multi-character family questionnaire.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, workspace navigation, and project-level questionnaire dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing branding, optional workspace controls, and hero illustration.
frontend/src/components/bookSetup/BookSe: Multi‑step dialog for answering and saving book setup questions, including project renaming and loading saved answers.
frontend/src/components/bookSetup/bookSe: Static list of structured book setup questions defining IDs, categories, and selectable options.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Form component for creating or editing a character with fields for background, motivations, relationships, flaws, voice, and role.
Displays a character’s details in card sections for background, motivations, relationships, flaws, voice, and story role.
frontend/src/components/characters/Creat: Wizard dialog for creating multiple band members with step-based input, validation, and project character name checks.
frontend/src/components/characters/Multi: Multi-person questionnaire wizard allowing dynamic person creation, validation, and character import into a project.
frontend/src/components/characters/multi: Defines types and constants for family roles, gender options, and person drafts used in the questionnaire.
frontend/src/components/ExportProjectBut: Button component exporting the selected project to Markdown with success and error toasts.
UI component for selecting, creating, renaming, deleting projects, and opening their questionnaire.
frontend/src/components/prologue/Prologu: Editor for creating or updating a project's prologue sections with form state and save functionality.
Displays a read-only outline of prologue sections and draft content in card layout.
frontend/src/components/WorkspaceMenu.ts: Dropdown workspace menu for navigating sections, selecting genres, managing custom categories, and logging out.
frontend/src/components/worldbuilding/Wo: Editor for worldbuilding categories allowing description edits and note additions tied to a selected project.
frontend/src/config/workspaceMenuItems.t: Defines workspace menu item metadata for genres and writing tool sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating project, character, and related backend data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/exportProject.ts: Generates a markdown export of a project’s characters, worldbuilding, and prologue, then triggers a file download.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/sections/CharactersPage.tsx: UI page for listing, creating, and editing characters with dialogs and summary views.
frontend/src/sections/ProloguePage.tsx: Displays prologue editing and outline tabs for the selected project’s opening section.
Worldbuilding editor page showing expandable categories with prompts and saved data.
frontend/src/state/useProjects.ts: Manages project list and selected project state with localStorage persistence and auto-selection logic.
frontend/src/state/useWorkspaceCategorie: Handles built‑in and custom workspace categories, including localStorage persistence and ID-safe creation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/views/HomeView.tsx: Landing page showing branding and sign‑up/login entry points.
frontend/src/views/LoginView.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with error handling and loading states.
frontend/src/views/SignUpView.tsx: Sign‑up screen using Internet Identity with similar UI and error handling as login.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing multi‑character questionnaire features, issues, and requirements.
